revised_title: Revisiting Reptilian Remains from the Trias of Elgin: A New Insight into the Palate Structure of Hyperodapedon Gordoni
tldr: The author examines reptilian fossils from the Trias of Elgin and provides new insights into the structure of the palate in Hyperodapedon Gordoni, a reptile from the Triassic period. The study reveals differences in the skull structure compared to previous interpretations, offering a better understanding of the reptile's classification and evolution.
